Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator McClure without amendment. With written report No. 99-498.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1008.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to amend the Fire Island National Seashore Act of 1964.

summary.text: States that regulations of the Secretary of the Interior concerning zoning for the Fire Island National Seashore, New York, preempt other Federal or State laws.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fire Island National Seashore Act of 1964.
